code: import{useContext}from"react";import{GlobalContext}from"../services/AppContext";var CommonFuntions=function CommonFuntions(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),data=_useContext.data,updateData=_useContext.updateData,sectionIndex=_useContext.sectionIndex;var AddExperience=function AddExperience(){var list={from:"",to:"",text:""};data[sectionIndex].sections.push(list);updateData(data);};var AddLanguage=function AddLanguage(){data[sectionIndex].sections.push("");updateData(data);};var list={projectName:"",projectDescription:""};data[sectionIndex].sections.push(list);updateData(data);};var UpdateLanguage=function UpdateLanguage(e,index){data[sectionIndex].sections[index]=e.target.value;updateData(data);};var UpdateProjectName=function enable=false;data[sectionName].sections.map(function(section,index){if(!enable){if(section.to!==""&&section.from!==""&&section.text!==""){enable=true;}}});return enable;};var CheckProjectsStatus=function CheckProjectsStatus(){var
